name: Small Your Worlds Belong To Us
name_original: Small Your Worlds Belong To Us
description:
You play as The World Destroyer. You must destroy the large planets whilst avoiding the small ones so that you can claim them as your own.

Small Your Worlds Belong To Us was made for the the createChester2022 game jam. It was made by the team "The Leftovers" with the theme "Small Worlds". It was made in 3 days by a team of 4. 

Small Your Worlds Belong To Us is a 2.5D scrolling shooter game where you play as a spaceship called The World Destroyer, that is tasked with destroying all large planets so it's empire can take the small worlds as their own.

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Shoot

Esc - Pause

Requires:

Windows PC, Monitor at at least 1080p

Team Members

Szymon Sroka (Level 6) - 3D art, 2D art

Jordan Holman (Level 5) - Programming

Edward Dawson (Level 5) - Programming

Alex Gordon (Level 4 Software Engineering) - Programming
